snippet.title: PowerWash Simulator 0.5 Update Trailer
snippet.description:
PowerWash Simulator 0.5 Trailer - I Know Wash You Did Last Summer! Welcome to content update 0.5, with new power washer skins, extension, 4 new levels, key rebinding and much more!

Wash away your worries with the soothing sounds of high-pressure water. Fire up your power washer and blast away every speck of dirt and grime you can find, all with the simple satisfaction of power-washing to a sparkling finish.

Play PowerWash Simulator here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1290000/PowerWash_Simulator/

For more pressure washing goodness subscribe to our channel!
Follow our Twitter for daily satisfying content: https://bit.ly/TwitterPWS
Join our Discord to join the conversation: https://discord.gg/powerwashsimulator
Follow us on TikTok for quick spray socials: https://bit.ly/PWSTikTok

#PowerWashSimulator #Powerwashing #Pressurewashing #Gaming #Games #IndieGame #IndieDev

We are FuturLab and can't wait for your to play the latest update for our power washing game!
